ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“Was that the first day
you came into my room?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
“…that's right.”{PAUSE}“We lived next to each other.”{PAUSE}“But I really didn't know
you that well.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“I've known you since we were children
and always thought we were close…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “You think he wants to come in?”

dialogStrings: “You think he wants to come in?”

{Tifa}
“Was that the first day
you came into my room?”

{Tifa}
“…that's right.”{PAUSE}“We lived next to each other.”{PAUSE}“But I really didn't know
you that well.”

{Tifa}
“I've known you since we were children
and always thought we were close…”

{Tifa}
“That's right…”{PAUSE}“I…really didn't know {Cloud}
that well.”{PAUSE}“That's why I was a bit surprised
when {Cloud} asked me
to come out to the well.”

“{Tifa} was so popular and
I never played much with the others…”

{Tifa}
“But, but listen!
After {Cloud} left town,
I thought about him a lot.”

{Tifa}
“I thought, I wonder how
{Cloud} is doing?”{PAUSE}“I wondered if he was
able to get into SOLDIER?”

“I even started reading the newspaper,
just to see if {Cloud} was
in any of the articles.”

{Tifa}
“But, but listen!
After {Cloud} left town,
I thought about him a lot.”

{Tifa}
“I thought, I wonder how
{Cloud} is doing?”{PAUSE}“I wondered if he was
able to get into SOLDIER?”

“I even started reading the newspaper,
just to see if {Cloud} was
in any of the articles.”

“Don't worry about me, {Tifa}”{PAUSE}“Tell this guy later.
He'll probably be happy.”
